summary: After a twenty-year stay at an asylum for a double murder, a mother returns to her estranged daughter where suspicions arise about her behavior.
cast: Joan Crawford|Diane Baker|Leif Erickson|Howard St. John|John Anthony Hayes|Rochelle Hudson|George Kennedy|Edith Atwater|Mitchell Cox|Vicki Cos|Patricia Crest|Laura Hess|Howard Hoffman|Patty Lee|Lynn Lundgren|Lee Majors|Robert Ward
keywords: altered version of studio logo|mother daughter estrangement|asylum|doctor|farm
title: El caso de Lucy Harbin
